# The Cooperstone Lab 
*✨ A mass spectacular team ✨*

:::{style="font-size: 90%;"}
We are an interdisciplinary group of researchers in the departments of Horticulture & Crop Science, and Food Science & Technology at Ohio State University. We study the factors that govern biosynthesis of health beneficial phytochemicals in crops, how they contribute to human health, and how to make our crops better.
